Игра прекрасна! Тем более эта игра 2007 года. В игре есть много интересных уровней, сейчас я на 17 уровне. Сначала в игре уровни лёгкие, а потом начинаются сложные уровни. Своих денег игра стоит. Уже недавно сразу купил 2 часть. Одним словом игра крутая!

One of the better classic puzzle games, if you play games on PC you most certainly know about it or have played it. Puzzles ramp up in difficulty as you go and at the end you even end up "cheating" the system. Intriguing story and interesting character development will keep you in, it's a short game but very well done.

這款的知名度已經不用多說，最令人驚豔的除了玩法以外還有就是V社最擅長的劇情，遊戲流程雖短，凡有基礎3D概念的玩家基本都能快速通關，但是關卡設計非常細膩，引導也很鮮明，總體玩下來真的非常驚喜，花了大約3個小時全部通關還挑戰了一張困難模式的地圖，是個不容錯過的精品 (警告:避免在昏暗的環境下遊玩，很容易暈)

Had a great time with this. A beautifully simple concept, beautifully delivered. It's just tremendously well-judged overall - as with everything Valve ever does, it seems. 

The humour strikes exactly the right notes. The music kicks in at exactly the right places. The dark, dystopian undertones are neither overstated nor understated. Puzzles had exactly the right level of challenge: I had to stop and engage my brain on occasion, but nothing held me back too long, so I was able to play through the game at (what I felt was) exactly the right pace. It all just came together into a thoroughly satisfying, if short, experience. 

 There was really no excuse for not having played this. Glad I finally got round to it. Now on to the sequel!

Lots of fun. I liked the difficulty level - not too easy to get bored, but also not too hard to be frustrating.

It may be really short (Can be finished in one day, under 30 minutes), but the puzzles, hidden story and comedy [spoiler] "Here, I'll put you on: [b] HELLOOOO- [/b] THAT'S YOU, THAT'S HOW DUMB YOU SOUND." [/spoiler] makes it worth it. The sequel (Portal 2, duh) is also worth it. More story, longer play time, MORE comedy, Co-Op, custom tests, lemons? 

I highly recommend this, and Portal 2. Especially Portal 2. Buy it, [i] now. [/i]

Маловато, но интересно

Portal is a very unique game. It has one of the very rare and interesting traits in games, it manages to make the player feel like they are making the choice like they are the ones who are breaking the rules of the game (or in this case glados) which is something not many story driven games are able to do. 

In short Valve has managed to make a story game where the player does not realise they are being led from place to place but believe they are discovering it themselves.
One of the best games I have ever played
muy bueno uwu

Всем торта! Portal - это игра с уникальным геймплеем, которая сильно запала мне в душу. Сюжет, юмор и геймплей с головоломками, которые заставляют подумать. Игра несложная, она интересная. В ней нет сухого и душного набора головоломок, как многие могут подумать, все уровни сопровождаются юмором и сюжетом, с которым проходить игру можно на одном дыхании.
Игра является прологом для немного другой Portal 2, которая мне понравилась ещё больше. Ради второй части я и решил пройти первую. И по итогу, игра мне зашла. Советую всем и каждому, это уникальный опыт в прохождении игр!

I don't know how this game managed to blend comedy, puzzle/platformer, drama and thriller, but this game did it. I beat the game faster than the average, and I completed all the advanced rooms relatively fast. Thank you game for making me feel smart :) A very fun, interesting puzzle game, and a game I feel like every gamer should play at least once.
